inclusion.criterion: according to the diagnostic criteria for functional gastrointestinal disorders ROME
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: masking: single-blind trial where only the evaluator will be blinded
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: interventions: standard medical treatment and osteopathic treatment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients who are not studying physical treatments
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 31-year-old woman complaining of abdominal pain. She has been diagnosed with functional abdominal pain and meets the criteria for inclusion in this trial.
